titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the free exportation of leather, hides, corn, butter and cheese.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our Court at Whitehall the 11th day of May, 1666. In the Eighteenth year of Our Reign.".
Provides for export without forfeitures during the Anglo-French war.
Arms 77; Steele notation: Defensive Tenants and.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
